GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with count of all comments received, sorted by most recent first

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its id

body.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
body.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments by its article_id

body.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
